title: Contemporary poetry and religious experience (University of Chichester)
text: ( Source : University of Chichester ) THE work of popular poets who have written about Christian faith - including RS Thomas , Elizabeth Jennings , and Geoffrey Hill - are to be explored at the University of Chichester. A paper looking at their
